太陽花2014打國際牌用左：Democracy at 4am 做 New York Times 廣告的headline
Image: https://66.media.tumblr.com/f3cb9ec1e73622522e6b8c740ec4cf2a/tumblr_inline_pasg90fA351sqdkec_500.png

呢條標題係受 1996年諾貝爾文學獎得主，波蘭詩人維斯瓦娃．辛波絲卡 Wislawa Szymborska 嘅詩，Four in the morning 嘅啟發，去形容對台灣警察嘗試對學生佔據行政院，武力清場的恐懼同不安。

今次特衰政府係凌晨四點出 press conference ，好正，天網恢恢，曲綫祼露對香港年青人民主訴求的打壓。
Hong Kong government press conference at 4 am

Four in the Morning – Wislawa Szymborska
The hour from night to day.
The hour from side to side.
The hour for those past thirty.

The hour swept clean to the crowing of cocks.
The hour when earth betrays us.
The hour when wind blows from extinguished stars.
The hour of and-what-if-nothing-remains-after-us.

The hollow hour.
Blank, empty.
The very pit of all other hours.

No one feels good at four in the morning.
If ants feel good at four in the morning
–three cheers for the ants. And let five o’clock come
if we’re to go on living.
